name: Nurlan Badirkhanov
about: I am Nurlan Bedirkhanov, a mobile developer with over 3 years of experience. During this time, I have developed over 30 applications, thanks to which I have acquired deep knowledge and skills in the IT field. My portfolio includes cooperation with large companies such as Pioneer and Rich Media.Over the years, I have launched two of my own brands: Creativ'S and ILNOD Studio. As part of Creativ'S, I developed successful applications such as Kiraye.az and Vakanciya.az. These projects gained good popularity, and later I sold the studio to one of the companies to focus on other promising areas.Currently, I hold the position of Head of Mobile Development at Pioneer in Azerbaijan, where I work on large projects. In parallel, I continue to develop my ILNOD Studio brand and am engaged in the creation of innovative applications such as Earnod, Earnod 2 and Earnod Delta.I also cooperate with On-Line, developing a taxi application that will cover the whole of Azerbaijan. This project, along with my other initiatives, is planned to be launched in 2025.For me, creating high-quality, in-demand applications is not just a job, but a way to contribute to the development of technology. I strive to ensure that my ILNOD brand becomes more and more recognizable, and that the projects bring benefit and convenience to thousands of users.
